overview:
Josh is a digital innovator and entrepreneur and is co-founder of Genesis Media, now serving as Chief Product Officer and Board Member of Genesis Media. Josh leads the company’s strategic product development as well as leading Genesis Studios, an owned and operated video publishing network and production studio.

Josh is the co-founder and former CEO of TVGenesis which he built into an internet leading video broadcast platform reaching 150 million viewers per month across 6 channels before merging with AdGenesis to create Genesis Media in November 2011. He is also the former CEO of Shopflick.com, a video-powered e-commerce marketplace which was acquired from Sequoia-backed Sugar Inc. Previously, He co-founded and led Blue Rooster Media, a multi-platform digital innovations agency based in Toronto which he co-founded and lead as its CEO. While with Blue Rooster, Josh also co-founded WOMAN.ca, a social publishing platform, overseeing its growth from inception in 2008 to acquisition in 2010 by Transcontinental Media (TCL.A). Josh has a Bachelor of Science from McGill University and a Master’s degree in Epidemiology from the University of Toronto.
